actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the first Monday in August of any year in which a former President is living as a national day of celebration of the birthday of any living former President.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the first Monday in August of any year in which a former President is living as a national day of celebration of the birthday of any living former President.

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the first Monday in August of any year in which a former President is living as a national day of celebration of the birthday of any living former President.
